summary: Diff adds a single-page React+TS marketing site with black/gold theme, sections for Hero/About/Services/Gallery/Why Choose Us/Testimonials/FAQ/Contact, scroll-reveal animations with reduced-motion handling, and a sticky WhatsApp button. Most requirements appear implemented, but the “Why Choose Us” content cannot be verified as matching the user-provided bullet points exactly (as required).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Why Choose Us section containing all six bullet points provided by the user (exactly as listed).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff implements a 6-item Why Choose Us section, but the titles/descriptions are authored content and there is no evidence they match the user-provided bullet points "exactly as listed" (the required canonical list is not shown in the diff summary).

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty backend canister (actor {}) despite no backend behavior being requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is purely about a frontend marketing website; no backend features or canister logic were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes third-party attribution/marketing link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters and a "Built with ♥" message.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria; introduces outbound marketing/attribution content.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity provider wiring and actor hook usage scaffolding even though authentication was not required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says authentication is not required; adding II scaffolding is extra beyond requested marketing site functionality.
